name: 27 Days in a Spaceship
description:
I've created a game where you are in charge of keeping a crew of astronauts alive for 27 days until rescue arrives. Unfortunately, I wasn't able to implement the drawings of the crew or able to set tasks properly for each crew member.

Gameplay:

Use the numbers between 1-3 to set a task for each crew member but only one crew member can perform a task at a time.

1 - Sets the astronaut to drink water

2 - Sets the astronaut to eat

3 - Sets the astronaut to sleep

I must also thank Kevin MacLeod for providing free music from his website.

Github:

https://github.com/FanMan/27-Days-in-a-Spaceship
